Reviews.Title: Nokia phone
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth Tarodi
Reviews.Content: Hmmm I was  wating very much, because my original Nokia 5230 was very good. This copy isn't very good: the voice isn't good,  the speaker isn't working always...so I'm very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: awful phone
Reviews.Author: patrick
Reviews.Content: out of all the 'smart' phones I've ever seen, the Nokia Nuron was the worst phone I ever used. for starters, the people who designed this phone obviously forgot to add WiFi to this phone. all smart phones work on wifi... secondly, the USB port only allows the phone to transfer data, which was a major inconvenience, plus, I lost the data cable within the first month I got this phone because it was so damn short. finally, nokia stated that there was a software update for this phone, but when I went to download the software update, the Nokia sync suite software said it was up to date... but the last update was in 2010...I would suggest that you skip this phone because its just not made to be usable.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: D. Lobban "Hardbod"
Reviews.Content: Has some scratches and wear and tear phones works fine but i got charger, sim cards and case box and manuals so not bad for the price

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: DeEntre
Reviews.Content: Has GPS like newer phones. Was a good stop stop gap phone for me in between phones for the price as well.

Reviews.Title: did not work
Reviews.Author: bryan
Reviews.Content: I try to switch my sim card to this phone but did not work at all, I cannot send messages and cannot make any calls pls help me with this issue.

Reviews.Title: please don't buy it . not worth a doller.
Reviews.Author: adnan
Reviews.Content: please don't buy it . not worth a doller it got broken on the first day i got it. not worth it .it not unlock phone .

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!!! I'd rate it 0 stars but amazon won't let me
Reviews.Author: Linda C. Reed
Reviews.Content: Alright I own this phone and its the worst phone you could own, I have no positive things to say for this phone.now the cons: very bad camera, freezes a lot, the screen is plastic and gets easily starched, and don't get me started of the dust that get s built up where the battery is. I could say more horrible things but to get to the point its. slow, too thick, and wifi sucks on it.

Reviews.Title: NOT UNLOCKED
Reviews.Author: MARY
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE WAS NOT UNLOCKED NEVER ACCEPT MY SIM CARD , I DONT KNOW WHY THEY SAY THAT IS UNLOCKED IF IT IS NOT

Reviews.Title: The dumbest smart phone ever.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "And now you know...."
Reviews.Content: Ok, let me first say that I purchased this on sale for about 120 dollars, and even at that price I think it's overpriced.Impressions:-Call quality is great, speakerphone is loud and distortion-free-The screen is very small. Pixel density isn't that great, although it's not horrible.-The camera is ok for taking well lit pictures but it's very weak in low light as there's no flash built in.-The touch screen isn't very responsive, sometimes taking multiple taps over the same area to register. I don't know if this is a problem with the screen or lag on the processor. this seems very spotty however because 90% of the time the phone works perfectly.-The GPS feature works reasonably well, although the GPS maps are a bit sluggish on this phone....The Symbian OS has a steeper learning curve than a lot of other smartphone OSes, but once you learn to navigate it, it's fairly easy. an interesting feature is the ability to add contacts to the main screen and scroll through them. The problem is that the icons are small and the scrolling is inconsistent. It's usually faster to enter your address book and find your contacts.This phone has a decent amount of features, but the problem is nothing is terribly well executed. If you manage to find this phone in the 60-70 dollar range and you're not looking for anything special you will probably be reasonably satisfied with this phone. Just understand that this is one of the dumbest smart phones I've ever seen.

Reviews.Title: Sweet phone!
Reviews.Author: Atlas
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone. This is one of the nicest Nokia phones I ever owned. It feels solid and looks very chique!
